title: Sonic All-Stars Racing Transformed + DLCs [online/offline]
description:
================================================================================
Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed + DLCs working online! Just install & play.
================================================================================

Multilanguage


================================================================================
About this Jimbus edition:
================================================================================

- Custom installer compressed (1xDVD5), which can shutdown the computer for you at the end of the installation.
- The game is updated to the last version until today (6th patch/14-january) and includes the Metal Sonic & Outrun DLC, a new character called Willemus and the Yogscast and Ryo Hazuki DLCs.
- Voice and text are in several languages (none of them has been deleted). 
- Online multiplayer works with Steam. 
- A saved game, a guide about how to play online and the libraries the game requires are also included.


================================================================================
Instructions:
================================================================================

1. Run "Setup.exe" to install the game.
2. Use the shortcuts the installer creates.


================================================================================
FAQ:
================================================================================

Q: Does the multiplayer work?
A: Yes, local and online.

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: No.

Q: But can I use Steam to play?
A: Yes, for the online multiplayer. 

Q: What DLCs are included?
A: All appeared until today.

Q: Does it work under Windows 10?
A: Yes, it does. 


Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation
